issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I am using webview to dislplay indoor map in my application. It is working fine with Android and lower version of iOS but not displaying on iOS 11.3 and iOS 11.4

Thank You,
Pankti
fields.summary: Ti.App.fireEvent not working in 11.3 and 11.4 in ios
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio: Version: version 5.0.0.2
SDK: 7.0.2
CLI: 5.0.14

comments.body: Apple introduced a breaking change in iOS 11 that we have workarounded in SDK 7.1.0+, see TIMOB-25762 for details.
